com.threerings.presents.server

Class ShutdownManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threerings.presents.server.ShutdownManager
  • Deprecated. 
    use Lifecycle

    @Deprecated
public class ShutdownManager
extends Object
    Handles the orderly shutdown of all server services.
